channel.title: How can I make my server a little bit more stable?
channel.description:
Ok, I tried using the list to stop SYIpkpker but that didn't work. I'm on another Port anyways. But I've noticed that people have been trying to null me with the stupid "Blitzbot" if you will... Anyway, is there a way I can just make it more stable? Like hold more than 25 players? I think that is the max it will hold. And if there is a way to stop the "Blitzbot" please tell me. I'm using Allstar-Scape BASE! I didn't leech it if that's all you want to tell me. :p
Anyway, thanks in advance. Brandon.

item.title: How can I make my server a little bit more stable?
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

If you don’t want dodian or RS2D make you’re own framework.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I make my server a little bit more stable?
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

What do you mean move away from wL? I don’t want dodian or RS2D…

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make my server a little bit more stable?

item.title: How can I make my server a little bit more stable?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

  1. Learn Java
  2. Move away from wL
  3. Make everything yourself
  4. Be happy

There.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make my server a little bit more stable?

item.title: How can I make my server a little bit more stable?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

You could remove thread per client, there is a tutorial by Stormcutter in the tutorials section. This removes nulls, SYIs, etc.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make my server a little bit more stable?
